Class DoubleAdditive

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.sw2019.model.Weapon
      • it.polimi.sw2019.model.DoubleAdditive
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DoubleAdditive
extends Weapon
    this class represents the weapon cards which have two power to be used

    Luca Giacometti
